comment.author: 71696016@N04
comment._content:
This image makes a strong social/political comment. Would you be interested in posting it to a new group formed for images which express the artists social or political viewpoint? And would you be prepared to write a line or two as a kind of explanation of your viewpoint to spark discourse? If so we would be very pleased to welcome you. Please get in touch.
 
Admin at Social and Political Commentary Group
